title: Germany Year Zero (Roberto Rossellini) DVD
description:
Germany Year Zero (Roberto Rossellini) DVD
 
Germania anno zero

PAL 4:3 DVD 3.51GB
69 minutes 11 seconds
Additions: a few movie posters

Easily in the top 5 most shocking war films made. There may be no fighting in this film but it's all about war.

Taken from British TV. In German/English/French with hardcoded English subtitles (not on the English sections). Not a perfect copy but superior to any of the rubbish DVD releases I've seen (some have been over-dubbed into Italian).


This has been re-uploaded as some people had audio problems with the AVI. Maybe best to leave this as a DVD or the problem may return.

Please continue to seed once you grab this.
